ds2.1.1:1.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti somanassasahagataṁ ñāṇasampayuttaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ
ds2.1.1:1.2_1: vā saddārammaṇaṁ vā gandhārammaṇaṁ vā rasārammaṇaṁ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṁ vā dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ
ds2.1.1:2.1_0: Phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṁ hoti,
ds2.1.1:3.1_0: Vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṁ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti,
ds2.1.1:5.1_0: Sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāsaṅkappo hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti, sammāsati hoti, sammāsamādhi hoti,
ds2.1.1:7.1_0: Alobho hoti, adoso hoti, amoho hoti, anabhijjhā hoti, abyāpādo hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti,
ds2.1.1:13.1_0: Ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:14.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:15.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṁ cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ
ds2.1.1:15.2_1: sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.1:16.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:17.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:18.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:19.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā sammāsaṅkappo—
ds2.1.1:20.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāro cittassa anusandhānatā anupekkhanatā—
ds2.1.1:21.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye pīti pāmojjaṁ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṁ attamanatā cittassa—
ds2.1.1:22.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.1:23.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
ds2.1.1:24.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo saddhā saddhindriyaṁ saddhābalaṁ—
ds2.1.1:25.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
ds2.1.1:25.2_1: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ sammāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.1:26.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati—
ds2.1.1:27.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
ds2.1.1:28.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā
ds2.1.1:28.2_1: paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo
ds2.1.1:28.2_2: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ
ds2.1.1:29.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:30.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.1:31.2_0: Yo tesaṁ arūpīnaṁ dhammānaṁ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ—
ds2.1.1:32.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā
ds2.1.1:32.2_1: paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo
ds2.1.1:32.2_2: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ
ds2.1.1:33.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā sammāsaṅkappo—
ds2.1.1:34.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
ds2.1.1:34.2_1: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ sammāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.1:35.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati—
ds2.1.1:36.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
ds2.1.1:37.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo saddhā saddhindriyaṁ saddhābalaṁ—
ds2.1.1:38.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
ds2.1.1:38.2_1: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ sammāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.1:39.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati—
ds2.1.1:40.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
ds2.1.1:41.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā
ds2.1.1:41.2_1: paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo
ds2.1.1:41.2_2: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ
ds2.1.1:42.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye hirīyati hiriyitabbena hirīyati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.1:43.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ottappati ottappitabbena ottappati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.1:44.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye alobho alubbhanā alubbhitattaṁ asārāgo asārajjanā asārajjitattaṁ anabhijjhā alobho kusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.1:45.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye adoso adussanā adussitattaṁ abyāpādo abyāpajjo adoso kusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.1:46.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā
ds2.1.1:46.2_1: paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo
ds2.1.1:46.2_2: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ
ds2.1.1:47.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye alobho alubbhanā alubbhitattaṁ asārāgo asārajjanā asārajjitattaṁ anabhijjhā alobho kusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.1:48.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye adoso adussanā adussitattaṁ abyāpādo abyāpajjo adoso kusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.1:49.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā
ds2.1.1:49.2_1: paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo
ds2.1.1:49.2_2: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ
ds2.1.1:50.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye hirīyati hiriyitabbena hirīyati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.1:51.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ottappati ottappitabbena ottappati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.1:52.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa passaddhi paṭipassaddhi passambhanā paṭipassambhanā paṭipassambhitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:53.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa passaddhi paṭipassaddhi passambhanā paṭipassambhanā paṭipassambhitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:54.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa lahutā lahupariṇāmatā adandhanatā avitthanatā—
ds2.1.1:55.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa lahutā lahupariṇāmatā adandhanatā avitthanatā—
ds2.1.1:56.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa mudutā maddavatā akakkhaḷatā akathinatā—
ds2.1.1:57.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa mudutā maddavatā akakkhaḷatā akathinatā—
ds2.1.1:58.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa kammaññatā kammaññattaṁ kammaññabhāvo—
ds2.1.1:59.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa kammaññatā kammaññattaṁ kammaññabhāvo—
ds2.1.1:60.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa paguṇatā paguṇattaṁ paguṇabhāvo—
ds2.1.1:61.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa paguṇatā paguṇattaṁ paguṇabhāvo—
ds2.1.1:62.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa ujutā ujukatā ajimhatā avaṅkatā akuṭilatā—
ds2.1.1:63.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye viññāṇakkhandhassa ujutā ujukatā ajimhatā avaṅkatā akuṭilatā—
ds2.1.1:64.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati—
ds2.1.1:65.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā
ds2.1.1:65.2_1: paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo
ds2.1.1:65.2_2: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ
ds2.1.1:66.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
ds2.1.1:67.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā
ds2.1.1:67.2_1: paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo
ds2.1.1:67.2_2: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ
ds2.1.1:68.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
ds2.1.1:68.2_1: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ sammāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.1:69.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
ds2.1.1:70.1_0: Ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:71.1_0: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti,
ds2.1.1:71.2_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:72.1_0: Katame tasmiṁ samaye cattāro khandhā honti?
ds2.1.1:73.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.1:74.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:75.2_0: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ
ds2.1.1:75.2_1: paññindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi saddhābalaṁ vīriyabalaṁ
ds2.1.1:75.2_2: satibalaṁ samādhibalaṁ paññābalaṁ hiribalaṁ ottappabalaṁ alobho adoso amoho anabhijjhā abyāpādo sammādiṭṭhi
ds2.1.1:75.2_3: hirī ottappaṁ kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi kāyalahutā cittalahutā kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā
ds2.1.1:75.2_4: cittakammaññatā kāyapāguññatā cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā cittujukatā sati sampajaññaṁ samatho vipassanā
ds2.1.1:75.3_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
ds2.1.1:76.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:76.4_0: Ime tasmiṁ samaye cattāro khandhā honti.
ds2.1.1:78.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:80.1_0: Katamā tasmiṁ samaye dve dhātuyo honti?
ds2.1.1:81.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:82.4_0: Imā tasmiṁ samaye dve dhātuyo honti.
ds2.1.1:83.1_0: Katame tasmiṁ samaye tayo āhārā honti?
ds2.1.1:84.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:85.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:86.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:86.4_0: Ime tasmiṁ samaye tayo āhārā honti.
ds2.1.1:88.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo saddhā saddhindriyaṁ saddhābalaṁ—
ds2.1.1:89.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
ds2.1.1:89.2_1: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ sammāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.1:90.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati—
ds2.1.1:91.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
ds2.1.1:92.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā
ds2.1.1:92.2_1: paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo
ds2.1.1:92.2_2: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ
ds2.1.1:93.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:94.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.1:95.2_0: Yo tesaṁ arūpīnaṁ dhammānaṁ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ—
ds2.1.1:96.1_0: Katamaṁ tasmiṁ samaye pañcaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ hoti?
ds2.1.1:97.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā sammāsaṅkappo—
ds2.1.1:98.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāro cittassa anusandhānatā anupekkhanatā—
ds2.1.1:99.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye pīti pāmojjaṁ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṁ attamanatā cittassa—
ds2.1.1:100.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.1:101.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
ds2.1.1:101.4_0: Idaṁ tasmiṁ samaye pañcaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ hoti.
ds2.1.1:102.1_0: Katamo tasmiṁ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti?
ds2.1.1:103.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā
ds2.1.1:103.2_1: paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo
ds2.1.1:103.2_2: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ
ds2.1.1:104.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā sammāsaṅkappo—
ds2.1.1:105.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
ds2.1.1:105.2_1: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ sammāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.1:106.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati—
ds2.1.1:107.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
ds2.1.1:107.4_0: Ayaṁ tasmiṁ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti.
ds2.1.1:108.1_0: Katamāni tasmiṁ samaye satta balāni honti?
ds2.1.1:108.2_0: Saddhābalaṁ, vīriyabalaṁ, satibalaṁ, samādhibalaṁ, paññābalaṁ, hiribalaṁ, ottappabalaṁ.
ds2.1.1:109.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo saddhā saddhindriyaṁ saddhābalaṁ—
ds2.1.1:110.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
ds2.1.1:110.2_1: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ vīriyabalaṁ sammāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.1:111.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammussanatā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati—
ds2.1.1:112.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
ds2.1.1:113.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā
ds2.1.1:113.2_1: paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṁ patodo
ds2.1.1:113.2_2: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṁ
ds2.1.1:114.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye hirīyati hiriyitabbena hirīyati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.1:115.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ottappati ottappitabbena ottappati pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.1:115.4_0: Imāni tasmiṁ samaye satta balāni honti.
ds2.1.1:116.1_0: Katame tasmiṁ samaye tayo hetū honti?
ds2.1.1:117.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye alobho alubbhanā alubbhitattaṁ asārāgo asārajjanā asārajjitattaṁ anabhijjhā alobho kusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.1:118.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye adoso adussanā adussitattaṁ abyāpādo abyāpajjo adoso kusalamūlaṁ—
ds2.1.1:119.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi—
ds2.1.1:119.4_0: Ime tasmiṁ samaye tayo hetū honti.
ds2.1.1:120.1_0: Katamo tasmiṁ samaye eko phasso hoti?
ds2.1.1:120.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:120.3_0: ayaṁ tasmiṁ samaye eko phasso hoti.
ds2.1.1:121.1_0: Katamā tasmiṁ samaye ekā vedanā hoti?
ds2.1.1:121.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.1:121.3_0: ayaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekā vedanā hoti.
ds2.1.1:122.1_0: Katamā tasmiṁ samaye ekā saññā hoti?
ds2.1.1:122.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:122.3_0: ayaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekā saññā hoti.
ds2.1.1:123.1_0: Katamā tasmiṁ samaye ekā cetanā hoti?
ds2.1.1:123.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:123.3_0: ayaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekā cetanā hoti.
ds2.1.1:124.1_0: Katamaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekaṁ cittaṁ hoti?
ds2.1.1:124.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:124.3_0: idaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekaṁ cittaṁ hoti.
ds2.1.1:125.1_0: Katamo tasmiṁ samaye eko vedanākkhandho hoti?
ds2.1.1:125.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ sātaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.1:125.3_0: ayaṁ tasmiṁ samaye eko vedanākkhandho hoti.
ds2.1.1:126.1_0: Katamo tasmiṁ samaye eko saññākkhandho hoti?
ds2.1.1:126.2_0: Yā tasmiṁ samaye saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:126.3_0: ayaṁ tasmiṁ samaye eko saññākkhandho hoti.
ds2.1.1:127.1_0: Katamo tasmiṁ samaye eko saṅkhārakkhandho hoti?
ds2.1.1:127.2_0: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ
ds2.1.1:127.2_1: paññindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi saddhābalaṁ vīriyabalaṁ
ds2.1.1:127.2_2: satibalaṁ samādhibalaṁ paññābalaṁ hiribalaṁ ottappabalaṁ alobho adoso amoho anabhijjhā abyāpādo sammādiṭṭhi
ds2.1.1:127.2_3: hirī ottappaṁ kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi kāyalahutā cittalahutā kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā
ds2.1.1:127.2_4: cittakammaññatā kāyapāguññatā cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā cittujukatā sati sampajaññaṁ samatho vipassanā
ds2.1.1:127.3_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
ds2.1.1:127.4_0: ayaṁ tasmiṁ samaye eko saṅkhārakkhandho hoti.
ds2.1.1:128.1_0: Katamo tasmiṁ samaye eko viññāṇakkhandho hoti?
ds2.1.1:128.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:128.3_0: ayaṁ tasmiṁ samaye eko viññāṇakkhandho hoti.
ds2.1.1:129.1_0: Katamaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekaṁ manāyatanaṁ hoti?
ds2.1.1:129.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:129.3_0: idaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekaṁ manāyatanaṁ hoti.
ds2.1.1:130.1_0: Katamaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekaṁ manindriyaṁ hoti?
ds2.1.1:130.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:130.3_0: idaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekaṁ manindriyaṁ hoti.
ds2.1.1:131.1_0: Katamā tasmiṁ samaye ekā manoviññāṇadhātu hoti?
ds2.1.1:131.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍaraṁ mano manāyatanaṁ manindriyaṁ viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.1:131.3_0: ayaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekā manoviññāṇadhātu hoti.
ds2.1.1:132.1_0: Katamaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ hoti?
ds2.1.1:132.3_0: idaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ hoti.
ds2.1.1:133.1_0: Katamā tasmiṁ samaye ekā dhammadhātu hoti?
ds2.1.1:133.3_0: ayaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ekā dhammadhātu hoti.
ds2.1.1:134.1_0: Ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:135.1_0: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye dhammā honti,
ds2.1.1:135.2_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:144.2_0: Saddhābalaṁ, vīriyabalaṁ, satibalaṁ, samādhibalaṁ, paññābalaṁ, hiribalaṁ, ottappabalaṁ—
ds2.1.1:160.1_0: Ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:161.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti somanassasahagataṁ ñāṇasampayuttaṁ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṁ vā …pe…
ds2.1.1:161.3_0: dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ vā panārabbha, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.1:162.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti somanassasahagataṁ ñāṇavippayuttaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ
ds2.1.1:162.2_1: vā saddārammaṇaṁ vā gandhārammaṇaṁ vā rasārammaṇaṁ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṁ vā dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ
ds2.1.1:162.3_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:163.1_0: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti,
ds2.1.1:163.2_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:164.2_0: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ
ds2.1.1:164.2_1: jīvitindriyaṁ sammāsaṅkappo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi saddhābalaṁ vīriyabalaṁ satibalaṁ samādhibalaṁ
ds2.1.1:164.2_2: hiribalaṁ ottappabalaṁ alobho adoso anabhijjhā abyāpādo hirī ottappaṁ kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi kāyalahutā
ds2.1.1:164.2_3: cittalahutā kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā cittakammaññatā kāyapāguññatā cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā
ds2.1.1:164.3_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
ds2.1.1:165.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti somanassasahagataṁ ñāṇavippayuttaṁ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṁ vā …pe…
ds2.1.1:165.3_0: dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ vā panārabbha, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.1:166.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti upekkhāsahagataṁ ñāṇasampayuttaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ
ds2.1.1:166.2_1: vā saddārammaṇaṁ vā gandhārammaṇaṁ vā rasārammaṇaṁ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṁ vā dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ
ds2.1.1:166.3_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:167.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṁ—
ds2.1.1:168.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṁ cetasikaṁ neva sātaṁ nāsātaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ
ds2.1.1:169.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ neva sātaṁ nāsātaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.1:170.2_0: Yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cetasikaṁ neva sātaṁ nāsātaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ vedayitaṁ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.1:170.4_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:171.1_0: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti,
ds2.1.1:171.2_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:172.2_0: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ
ds2.1.1:172.2_1: jīvitindriyaṁ sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi saddhābalaṁ vīriyabalaṁ satibalaṁ
ds2.1.1:172.2_2: samādhibalaṁ paññābalaṁ hiribalaṁ ottappabalaṁ alobho adoso amoho anabhijjhā abyāpādo sammādiṭṭhi hirī
ds2.1.1:172.2_3: ottappaṁ kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi kāyalahutā cittalahutā kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā cittakammaññatā
ds2.1.1:172.2_4: kāyapāguññatā cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā cittujukatā sati sampajaññaṁ samatho vipassanā paggāho avikkhepo.
ds2.1.1:173.1_0: Ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
ds2.1.1:174.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti upekkhāsahagataṁ ñāṇasampayuttaṁ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṁ vā …pe…
ds2.1.1:174.3_0: dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ vā panārabbha, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.1:175.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti upekkhāsahagataṁ ñāṇavippayuttaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ
ds2.1.1:175.2_1: vā saddārammaṇaṁ vā gandhārammaṇaṁ vā rasārammaṇaṁ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṁ vā dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ
ds2.1.1:175.3_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:176.1_0: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti,
ds2.1.1:176.2_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.1:177.2_0: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ
ds2.1.1:177.2_1: sammāsaṅkappo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi saddhābalaṁ vīriyabalaṁ satibalaṁ samādhibalaṁ hiribalaṁ
ds2.1.1:177.2_2: ottappabalaṁ alobho adoso anabhijjhā abyāpādo hirī ottappaṁ kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi kāyalahutā cittalahutā
ds2.1.1:177.2_3: kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā cittakammaññatā kāyapāguññatā cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā cittujukatā
ds2.1.1:178.1_0: Ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
ds2.1.1:179.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti upekkhāsahagataṁ ñāṇavippayuttaṁ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṁ vā …pe…
ds2.1.1:179.3_0: dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ vā panārabbha, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
